fields.summary: LLAP Workdirs need to default to YARN local

comments.body: Nope, is best referred to as a ${} variable in HiveConf itself to be self-documenting.
The substitutions in HiveConf sets the default value at init time, without the config object, so it doesn't look like that is going to work. Documented the default.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12778954/HIVE-12687.01.patch

{color:red}ERROR:{color} -1 due to build exiting with an error

ATTACHMENT ID: 12779100 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build
[~gopalv] ping? I can also just change HiveConf so substitution works more logically in defaults.
Doc note:  This updates the description of *hive.llap.daemon.work.dirs* so the new description needs to be included in the wiki when the LLAP parameters get documented (see HIVE-11358).
Also see HIVE-14392, which changes the description of *hive.llap.daemon.work.dirs* again in release 2.2.0.
